value.title: Baidu says 2nd-gen Kunlun AI chips enter mass production
value.excerpt: BEIJING, Aug 18 (Reuters) - Chinese tech giant Baidu said on Wednesday it had begun mass-producing second-generation Kunlun artificial intelligence (AI) chips, as it races to become a key player in the chip industry which Beijing is trying to strengthen.

value.title: National AI Research Resource Task Force seeks more ‘diverse’ public responses

value.title: EdgeQ samples SoC for 5G and AI inference engines
value.excerpt: EdgeQ is sampling a system-on-chip for 5G networks that reduces costs by running AI inference engines at the edge.

value.title: Pepperdata adds GPU-tracking tools to help IT teams maximize usage
value.excerpt: Pepperdata adds tools to monitor GPUs as part of a broader effort to help enterprise IT teams optimize utilization.

value.title: Qualcomm readies 5G and AI drone platform
value.excerpt: Qualcomm is unveiling its QRB5165 processor platform that enables aerial drones to tap both 5G and AI technologies.

value.title: Samsung is using Artificial Intelligence to design its new Exynos chips
value.excerpt: Samsung has confirmed that the company will be using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to create its new chips and added that it will be using new software from Synopsys, a leading chip design software firm.

value.title: Will Project Dojo be the Central Focus of Tesla's (TSLA) AI Day?

value.title: Samsung Joins Google and Nvidia in Using AI to Design Chips
value.excerpt: Samsung has reportedly started using artificial intelligence features in the Synopsys chip design tool for upcoming processors.

value.title: Samsung has its own AI-designed chip. Soon, others will too
value.excerpt: Samsung is using artificial intelligence to automate the insanely complex and subtle process of designing cutting-edge computer chips. The South Korean giant is one of the first chipmakers to use AI to create its chips.

value.title: Deep Learning Chip Market Trend, Forecast, Drivers, Restraints, Company Profiles and Key Players Analysis by 2028
value.excerpt: The global deep learning chip market is expected to reach a market size of USD 27.75 Billion by 2028 and register a high revenue CAGR, according to latest analysis by Emergen Research. Increasing quantum computing adoption is expected to drive global deep learning chip market growth to a significant extent during the forecast period.

value.title: KeepTruckin uses Ambarella AI chips to monitor truck drivers
value.excerpt: KeepTruckin will use Ambarella AI processors in its dashboard camera that can monitor both road conditions and driver awareness.

value.title: Motivo raises $12.5M Series A to speed up chip design with AI
value.excerpt: Chip design is a long slog of trial and error, taking years to bring a design to market. Motivo, a five year old startup from a chip industry veteran is creating software to speed up chip design from years to months using AI.

value.title: VW Aims To Increase Output By 30% At Its North American Plants With Better Software, AI, And Robotics
value.excerpt: VW believes better robots and industrial machines that can be updated will make factories much more efficient.

value.title: NVIDIA Launches New RTX A2000 GPU With 6GB GDDR6 ECC Memory
value.excerpt: NVIDIA officially launched the RTX A2000, a compact GPU designed for professionals, designed to fit into small form factor desktop PCs. Built upon the GPU brand’s current Ampere architecture, the card was built to handle a wide variety of professional tasks by accelerating AI and ray-tracing in workflows.

value.title: Knowles Releases AI-Enabled TWS Development Kit with Premium Features
value.excerpt: New TWS development kit shortens design cycle for OEMs and accelerates timeline to bring TWS products with advanced features to market.

value.title: Google Pixel 6 to sport 5nm Tensor chips made by Samsung: Report
value.excerpt: While Google is gearing up for the launch of its Pixel 6 series, a new report has revealed new information regarding the company’s new proprietary chipset. The upcoming Pixel 6 will sport the new Tensor chips that are based on a 5nm process produced by Samsung.
